code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{addCourse}from"../../utils/APIRoutes";import axios from"axios";import"./CoursesAdmin.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CoursesAdmin=_ref=>{let{}=_ref;const[courseData,setCourseData]=useState({name:"",level:"",description:"",image:""});const navigate=useNavigate();const handleInput=e=>{const{name,value}=e.target;setCourseData(prevData=>({...prevData,[name]:value}));};const handleSubmit=async()=>{try{await axios.post(addCourse,{...courseData});setCourseData({name:"",level:"",description:"",image:""});}catch(error){console.error("Error adding course:",error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container-coursesAdmin",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"form-coursesAdmin",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Add Course"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"name",placeholder:"Course Name",value:courseData.name,onChange:handleInput,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{name:"level",value:courseData.level,onChange:handleInput,required:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",disabled:true,children:"Select Level"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Beginner",children:"Beginner"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Intermediate",children:"Intermediate"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Advanced",children:"Advanced"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"description",placeholder:"Description",value:courseData.description,onChange:handleInput,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"image",placeholder:"Image URL",value:courseData.image,onChange:handleInput}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Course"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"view-courses-btn",onClick:()=>navigate("/course-list"),children:"View Courses"})]});};export default CoursesAdmin;
